full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL MTSAN RTZE MO DPUNG RGYAN LA BRTEN NAS RLUNG RTA'I RGYAL MTSAN GTZUGS PA'I CHO GA RDO RJE PHA LAM GYI RGYAL MTSAN ZHES PA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,'PHAGS MA RGYAL MTSAN RTZE MO'I DPUNG RGYAN GYI BSRUNG 'KHOR RAB GNAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A  *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI NAM BSGOS TSANGS PA CING GIR RGYAL PO'I RIGS SU 'KHRUNGS PA'I THAS RJES DON GRUB RDO RJE BSKUL BA LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI THO YON BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS DON GRUB PA'O, ,SHUBHAm, ,DIS KYANG MI MTHUN PA'I PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
